definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji

sentences.english: Ttip the punctuated equilibrium of market economics in their favor.
sentences.chinese: 以自己的方式确定市场经济的准确平衡。

sentences.english: Market economy system can be divided into upper organization and lower organization.
sentences.chinese: 市场经济结构分层包括下层组织和上层组织。

sentences.english: Market economy was in its embryonic stages as early as feudalist society.
sentences.chinese: 市场经济，在封建社会时期就有了萌芽。

sentences.english: Public finance is the functioning mode of finance in the country of market-oriented economy.
sentences.chinese: 公共财政是市场经济国家财政运行模式。

sentences.english: In the memo, the Argentine side recognized China's market economy status.
sentences.chinese: 在备忘录中，阿方正式承认中国的市场经济地位。

sentences.english: " They cite a "lack of confidence" as the reason that savings is not intermediated into investment.
sentences.chinese: 对市场经济缺乏信心是不愿意投资的主要原因。

sentences.english: In a market economy, city selection can be accomplished through the bond market.
sentences.chinese: 在市场经济中，城市的选择可以通过债券市场来完成。

sentences.english: The stock market in China has developed in tandem with the development of the socialist market economy. The securities market has made an important contribution to the economic growth of China.
sentences.chinese: 中国的股市同中国社会主义市场经济一起开始发展。

sentences.english: The development as market economy is perfect, the speed that science and technology innovates is accelerated increasingly.
sentences.chinese: 随着市场经济的发展完善，科技创新的速度日益加快。

sentences.english: Market economy, riches and honour is threatening.
Tow models, namely US and European ones, exist in the world capitalist market today.
sentences.chinese: 世界资本主义市场经济主要存在美国和欧洲两种模式。

sentences.english: This situation gave rise to a socialist market economy.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义市场经济应运崛起。

sentences.english: All this can transpire in market economies.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都可以在市场经济中发生。

sentences.english: Up to now, China has been the poster child for market-oriented economic reform success.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，中国一直是推行市场经济改革的成功范例。

sentences.english: Merger&Acquistion(M&A) is an important capital-operating method.
sentences.chinese: 企业并购是市场经济资本运营的重要方式。

sentences.english: Market economy is by no means equal to money making economy.
sentences.chinese: 市场经济绝不等于“搞钱”经济。

definition: to reform and open to the outside world/refers to Deng Xiaoping's policies from around 1980
to put money above everything else
natural economy (exchange of goods by bartering not involving money)
